00001 /*---------------------------------------------------------*
00002  * PORTABLE.H -- type and macro definitions for portable C *

00016     Standard types
00017 ----------------------------------------------------------------*/
00018 
00019 #ifdef bool
00020 #undef bool
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 #ifndef CURSES_H
00024 typedef int     bool;           /* >= 16 bits used as boolean   */
00025 #endif
00026 typedef int     boolean;
00027 typedef char    flag;           /* >= 8 bits used as boolean    */
00028 
00029 typedef unsigned short word;    /* >= 16 bit  unsigned type     */
00030 
00031 typedef int     rchar;          /* I/O function return values   */
00032 typedef char   *string;         /* for readability              */
00033 
00034 typedef int     status;         /* function status on return    */
00035 
00036 /* If void is not supported, uncomment the following line.      */
00037 /* typedef int  void;   */
00038 /* ------>    #define   DEFAULT int        Default size         */

00041 /*--------------------------------------------------------------
00042    Use this length and type for filename variables -- use
00043    256 on 4.2BSD since it is defined as such in dir.h   
00044 --------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 
00046 #ifndef MAXPATHLEN
00047 #define MAXPATHLEN  64
00048 #endif
00049 typedef char    path[MAXPATHLEN];
00050 
00051 
00052 /*--------------------------------------------------------------
00053    Define byte and BYTE to portably support an unsigned
00054    8 bit data type (see Section 2.9.1 in text).         
00055 --------------------------------------------------------------*/
00056 
00057 /*      If char is signed by default and unsigned keyword is
00058         not allowed with char, byte and BYTE are:
00059 typedef char      byte;                         * 8 bit unsigned type   * /
00060 #define BYTE(x)   (byte) ((x) & 0xff)           * BYTE truncates data   */
00061 
00062 /*      else they are:  */
00063 typedef unsigned char byte;
00064 #define BYTE(x)   (byte) ((x) & 0xff)
00065 
00066 
00067 /*---------------------------------------------------------------
00068    Standard macros
00069 ---------------------------------------------------------------*/
00070 
00071 #define HIBYTE(x)       (((x) >> 8) & 0xff)     /* hi byte of short     */
00072 #define LOBYTE(x)       ((x) & 0xff)            /* lo byte of short     */
00073 #define HIWORD(x)       (((x) >> 16) & 0xffffL) /* upper half of long   */
00074 #define LOWORD(x)       ((x) & 0xffffL)         /* lower half of long   */
00075 #define CHAR(x)         ((x) & 0x7F)            /* Truncate to 7 bits   */
00076 #define ASCII(x)        ((x) & 0x7F)            /* Convert to ascii     */
00077 #define WORD(x)         ((x) & 0xffffL)         /* Truncate to 16 bits  */
00078 #define DECODE(x)       ((int) ((x) - '0'))     /* int value of a digit */
00079 
00080 /* long unsigned right shift */
00081 #define LURSHIFT(n, b) (((long) (n) >> (b)) & (0x7fffffffL >> ((b) - 1)))
00082 
00083 /* number of elements in array a */
00084 #define DIM(a)          (sizeof(a)/sizeof(*(a)))
00085

00089 
00090 #define BIT_0   0x01
00091 #define BIT_1   0x02
00092 #define BIT_2   0x04
00093 #define BIT_3   0x08
00094 #define BIT_4   0x10
00095 #define BIT_5   0x20
00096 #define BIT_6   0x40
00097 #define BIT_7   0x80
00098 #define BIT_8   0x100
00099 #define BIT_9   0x200
00100 #define BIT_10  0x400
00101 #define BIT_11  0x800
00102 #define BIT_12  0x1000
00103 #define BIT_13  0x2000
00104 #define BIT_14  0x4000
00105 #define BIT_15  0x8000
00106 #define BIT_16  0x10000
00107 #define BIT_17  0x20000
00108 #define BIT_18  0x40000
00109 #define BIT_19  0x80000
00110 #define BIT_20  0x100000
00111 #define BIT_21  0x200000
00112 #define BIT_22  0x400000
00113 #define BIT_23  0x800000
00114 #define BIT_24  0x1000000
00115 #define BIT_25  0x2000000
00116 #define BIT_26  0x4000000
00117 #define BIT_27  0x8000000
00118 #define BIT_28  0x10000000
00119 #define BIT_29  0x20000000
00120 #define BIT_30  0x40000000
00121 #define BIT_31  0x80000000
00122 
00123 #define BitTest(x, bit) ((x) & (bit))
00124 
00125 #define BitSet(x, bit)  ((x) |= (bit))
00126 
00127 #define BitClr(x, bit)  ((x) &= ~(bit))
00128 
00129 #define BitAnd(x, y)    ((x) & (y))
00130 
00131 #define BitOr(x, y)     ((x) | (y))
00132 
00133 #define BitXor(x, y)    ((x) ^ (y))
00134 
00135 #define BitNot(x)       (~(x))
00136 
00137 #define BitShift(x, count)      ( ((count) > 0)? (x) << (count) : (x) >> (count) )

00143 
00144 #define public                  /* public is C default scope    */
00145 #define private static          /* static really means private  */
00146 #define LOCAL   auto            /* Local var on 68000           */
00147 #define EXTERN  extern          /* External variable            */
00148 #define MLOCAL  static          /* Local to module              */
00149 #define GLOBAL                  /* Global variable              */

00165 #define NO      (0)             /* "FALSE"                      */

00167 #define SUCCEED ( 0)            /* for use in exit()            */
00168 #define FAILURE (-1)            /* for exit() & error returns   */
00169 #define FAIL    (-1)            /* Function failure return val  */
00170 #define SUCCESS ( 0)            /* Function success return val  */
